video.title: 2018 Top Contributor Party in New York City - Highlights and Interviews
video.description:
See highlights and interviews from the 2018 Top Contributor Party in New York City.

Full article about the party: https://medium.freecodecamp.org/861da08a77e1

topLevelComment.author: Darren Joy
topLevelComment.text: Manish buddy! superstar at 52.30.. One of the hard working fCC helpers in the gitter chatrooms.. Sad I missed the get together.. Looks like you guys had funFun.

topLevelComment.author: Music prod
topLevelComment.text: Hello from Algeria  thank you so much for freecodecamp

topLevelComment.author: AL
topLevelComment.text: Thank you very much for all the material, freeCodeCamp is a dream itself, keep doing this please, greetings from Bolivia

topLevelComment.author: Adeodu Adeoye Lato Daniel
topLevelComment.text: Study of coding become simpler since I have joined free code camp you are all born teacher of teachers I am with you all the from Lagos, Nigeria.
